about_the_game:
Color Soldiers 3D: Team Paintball Arena Shooter


Step into the Ultimate Paintball Showdown!
Gear up for an adrenaline-pumping paintball war where quick thinking and rapid-fire action are the keys to victory. In Color Soldiers 3D, every splatter counts as you battle it out in vibrant arenas with players from all corners of the globe.

Unleash the Paintball Frenzy
Arm yourself with a trusty paintball blaster and dive headfirst into chaotic skirmishes. But here’s the twist—it’s not about knocking out opponents; it’s about claiming them for your team with a well-placed splash of color. Every hit you land flips an enemy to your side, turning the tide of battle in real time.

Switch Teams, Not Lives
Forget eliminations—Color Soldiers 3D is all about fast-paced strategy. One hit and your foe joins your team, so be ready to adapt as alliances shift and the battlefield becomes a dynamic palette of color. Outwit your opponents and dominate the ever-changing landscape.

Conquer the Arena
Victory isn’t just about surviving; it’s about owning the arena. The match ends when one player’s colors cover the field. Will you be the last warrior standing, or will your colors fade under the onslaught of your rivals?

Earn Your Paintball Glory
The more opponents you paint, the more rewards you rake in. Unlock new skins, upgrade your gear, and customize your blaster to show off your style. Only the best paintball warriors can claim the ultimate bragging rights.

Hone Your Skills
Sharpen your aim, perfect your dodges, and master the art of teamwork. Whether you’re teaming up with friends or flying solo, every match is a chance to prove your paint-splattering prowess.

Join the Global Paintball Revolution
Take on challengers in thrilling real-time battles across diverse arenas. Climb the leaderboards and stake your claim as the world’s top paintball champion.

Get ready to paint, conquer, and dominate in Color Soldiers 3D! Are you up for the challenge?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible with 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA or PulseAudio compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 (Yosemite) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible with 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: CoreAudio compatible sound card

name: Color Soldiers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible with 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Paintball battles where every hit flips the game!
